headline: The Hartford Declares Quarterly Dividend Of $375 Per Share Of Series G Preferred Stock
summary: The Hartford 's Board of Directors today declared a dividend of $375 on each of the Series G preferred stock payable on Feb. 18, 2025, to Series G preferred stock shareholders of record at the close...
